title: Nick Thomas-Symonds – 2021 Comments on Lord Frost
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Nick Thomas-Symonds, the Shadow Home Secretary, on 29 January 2021.
content:
Government chaos and confusion has led to a significant delay in appointing a permanent National Security Adviser.
